channel.title: Raspberry Pi on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on LC-Research

item.title: Setting up a Raspberry Pi Media Server
item.description: Wouldn’t it be nice to store all of your media files in one location and stream them to any device on your home network? An inexpensive Raspberry Pi and a couple of USB sticks can get the job done! This post guides you through all the steps required, step by step.
